alert.note: Alert for Kay (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 6:36PM CDT until May 12 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Kay County in northern Oklahoma... * Until 715 PM CDT. * At 636 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles east of Tonkawa, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ponca City, Tonkawa, Newkirk, Kaw City, Kildare, Kaw Lake, and Peckham. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
